component.name: Dia
component.summary: A desktop Mermaid diagram editor with live preview

description.p: Dia is a desktop application for creating and editing Mermaid diagrams. It features a code editor with syntax highlighting and a live-rendered preview, making it easy to build flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams, and more.

ul.li: CodeMirror-based editor with Mermaid syntax highlighting
Live diagram preview as you type
